FDG.function_description: Music streaming with recommendations & playback

core_logic.logic: The app starts on the home page (page 0). The user can take multiple actions: play a recommended song, open a playlist, adjust preference settings, or stay on the home page via the bottom tab. These actions are mutually exclusive, allowing the user to choose how to interact with the music streaming and recommendation features.

steps.summary: Play a recommended song
Open the 周杰伦歌曲大全 playlist
Open preference settings
Stay on the home page via bottom tab

FDG.function_description: The "乐馆 (Music Hall)" page in the music streaming app provides a curated space for music discovery, featuring recommended playlists, popular songs, personalized suggestions, and promotional content, along with playback controls and navigation options to explore different music categories and user-specific content.

core_logic.logic: The core logic starts at the entry page (page 0). The user clicks on the '乐馆 (Music Hall)' tab (action_ref [0,0]). This action navigates to the '乐馆' page (dst_page_idx 0), where curated music discovery content (playlists, songs, suggestions, promotions) and playback/navigation options are presented. There are no branches or loops as the action is a direct navigation to the target page.

steps.summary: Click on the '乐馆 (Music Hall)' tab to navigate to the Music Hall page.

FDG.function_description: Like button for current song

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic for the like button of the current song starts on the initial page (page 0). The user performs a click action on the like button associated with the currently playing song. This action leads to a destination page (page 2), completing the like functionality for the current song.

steps.summary: Click the like button for the current song

FDG.function_description: Play/Pause button for current song

core_logic.logic: The core logic is to interact with the Play/Pause button for the current song. The user clicks the Play/Pause button located at the bottom of the screen (near the song info). This action likely toggles the playback state (play to pause or vice versa) and may navigate to a related page (dst_page_idx 3) or update the UI to reflect the new playback state.

steps.summary: Click the Play/Pause button for the current song at the bottom of the screen.

FDG.function_description: Displays the currently playing song, playback queue, and provides options for playback settings, song management (e.g., download, add, delete), and navigation between playing, played songs, and played playlists within a music streaming app.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the more options button for a song (on the main page) to navigate to the song's options page. Then, on that page, another more options button (for the song entry) is clicked, likely to access further song - related actions or settings.

steps.summary: Click the more options button for a song on the main page to go to the song's options page
Click the more options button for the song entry on the song's options page

FDG.function_description: The "My" page in the music streaming app provides access to user - specific content and features, including the user's profile, membership center, options like collection, local, and purchased content, recent playback history, self - created and collected playlists, AI - related works, and also enables music playback control.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the app's main page (page 0) and clicks the '我的 (My)' bottom tab. This action navigates to the 'My' page (page 5), where user - specific content like profile, membership center, collection, local, purchased options, recent playback, playlists, and AI works, along with music playback control, become accessible.

steps.summary: Click the '我的 (My)' bottom tab to navigate to the 'My' page.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to import playlists by providing options to copy and paste playlist links or text - based song information, and then use the "One - click Import" function to complete the playlist import process.
data_out: 清空的粘贴文字输入框
清空后的歌单链接输入框

core_logic.logic: The user starts by clicking the '新建/导入歌单选项' to enter the playlist import flow. Then, they click '导入歌单标签' to access the input page. Next, they input the playlist link (or text) into the '歌单信息粘贴输入框'. After that, they click the '一键导入歌单按钮' to initiate the import. Finally, they click '我知道了' to confirm the import completion.

steps.summary: Click to enter the new/import playlist option page
Click to enter the playlist import input page
Input playlist link (or text) into the input box
Click the one - click import playlist button
Click '我知道了' to confirm import completion

FDG.function_description: The "更多" (More) page in the music streaming app provides access to additional features (like music games, settings, song identification, playlist import), account-related actions (QQ music import), storage management, mode customization, membership promotions, and other value - added services (ringtone section, VIP benefits).

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 5. First, click the hamburger menu button (action from [5,1]) to navigate to page 9 (the 'More' page). Then, click the back button (action from [9,0]) to return to page 5. There are no branches or loops as the actions form a simple navigation round - trip.

steps.summary: Click the hamburger menu button to go to the 'More' page
Click the back button to return to the original page

FDG.function_description: 设为互动歌单切换框
data_out: 互动歌单设置项状态更新

core_logic.logic: The process starts on page 7. The user clicks the '设为互动歌单切换框' (Set as Interactive Playlist Toggle) element. This action leads to page 11, completing the toggle operation.

steps.summary: Click the '设为互动歌单切换框' toggle

FDG.function_description: This page functions as the detail page for a newly created playlist ("华语流行歌单"), allowing users to view playlist information, edit the playlist, collect the playlist, play all songs (currently empty), add songs, and perform other operations related to the playlist.
data_out: 新创建的歌单（华语流行歌单）

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 7. The user clicks the '确定创建歌单按钮' (confirm create playlist button), which navigates to page 12 (the playlist detail page for '华语流行歌单'). On the detail page, the user can perform operations like editing, collecting, playing all (empty), or adding songs, but the core step here is the initial navigation to the playlist detail page via the create confirmation click.

steps.summary: Click the confirm create playlist button to navigate to the playlist detail page.

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to watch advertisements to earn time for free listening to VIP songs, with options to extend listening duration, track daily extension attempts, and view VIP songs available for free listening after ad - watching.

core_logic.logic: The user starts by clicking the '免费模式' button to enter the free mode page. Then, they close the advertisement via the X icon. Next, they click the '点击继续浏览按钮' to proceed. After that, at the page with multiple options, the user can either click the '返回按钮' to go back, or click '更多选项按钮' or '立即下载按钮' (with the latter two being leaf actions that don’t change the page).

steps.summary: Click '免费模式' button to enter free mode page
Click Close advertisement button (X icon) to dismiss ad
Click '点击继续浏览按钮' to proceed to next page
Click '返回按钮' to go back
Click '更多选项按钮' (leaf action, no page change)
Click '立即下载按钮' (leaf action, no page change)

FDG.function_description: 定时关闭 toggle switch

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 9 (the '更多' page). The core action is to click the '定时关闭' toggle switch, which transitions the app to page 58. This is a single-step flow with no branches or loops, as the action directly toggles the switch and navigates to the destination page.

steps.summary: Click the '定时关闭' toggle switch

FDG.function_description: The settings page of the music app allows users to configure account - related settings (such as personal information, push, message, privacy, and blacklist settings), lyrics - related settings (including desktop, status bar, lock screen, and car Bluetooth lyrics), as well as playback and download - related settings (like playback, sound effect, and sound quality settings, and options for simultaneous playback with other apps and dynamic cover on the playback page).

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 9 (a 'more' options page) and clicks the '设置' (Settings) option. This action navigates to the settings page (page 59), where account, lyrics, and playback/download - related configuration options are available. No branches or loops are present as only this initial navigation step is provided.

steps.summary: Click the '设置' option on page 9 to navigate to the settings page (page 59).

FDG.function_description: This page in QQ Music is for the "Song Recognition" feature, actively identifying playing music (currently in a 2 - second recognition process) and provides tips to improve recognition accuracy, with an option to manage floating window permissions for timely result reception.
data_out: 听歌识曲识别状态（识别中）

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the '听歌识曲' option on the '更多' page. Then, it proceeds to click the notification bar dropdown arrow, likely to manage floating window permissions or view recognition results. The flow is a straight line with no branches or loops.

steps.summary: Click '听歌识曲' option
Click notification bar dropdown arrow

FDG.function_description: 收藏歌单按钮
data_out: 华语流行歌单收藏状态更新

core_logic.logic: The core execution logic for the '收藏歌单' (favorite playlist) button involves a single step: clicking the '收藏歌单' button on the playlist page. This action is intended to mark the playlist as a favorite, and since there are no subsequent branches or loops, the flow ends here.

steps.summary: Click the '收藏歌单' button to favorite the playlist.

FDG.function_description: 添加歌曲按钮

steps.summary: Click the '添加歌曲' button

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to import a playlist by uploading images containing song information (with a maximum of 9 clear, unobstructed images) and then using the "One - Click Import" function, while also providing an option to view detailed tutorials.

待选择的图片文件列表
return to previous page (歌单导入 - 图片导入)

core_logic.logic: The user starts on page 14, clicks to switch to the image import tab (page 15), then clicks to upload images (page 18). At page 18, there's a branch: either cancel (return to page 15) or click 'Complete' (finalize the import, a leaf action).

steps.summary: Switch to image import tab
Click to upload images
Cancel image upload
Click 'Complete' to finalize import

FDG.function_description: This page provides a detailed tutorial for the QQ Music playlist import feature, explaining how to import songs from text, images, or web links to generate a playlist, and also shows the function entrances for this feature.
data_in: 歌单导入功能介绍页面

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 14. First, the user clicks the '查看详细教程' link (action S1) to navigate to page 17. Then, from page 17, the user clicks the back button (action S2) to return to page 7. There are no branches or loops as the steps are sequential navigation actions.

steps.summary: Click '查看详细教程' link to open tutorial page
Click back button to return to previous page

FDG.function_description: The playback settings page in the music app allows users to configure audio playback features, including toggling playback transition effects, volume balance, loudness adaptation, and intelligent sound quality enhancement, as well as previewing different audio transition modes.

FDG.function_description: This page allows the user to edit their nickname (with a text input field, character count, clear button, and confirm button) to update their profile nickname in the music app.

FDG.function_description: This page allows users to input a mobile phone number (for binding to their QQ Music account, with details on usage and change restrictions) and proceed to the next step.

FDG.function_description: This page allows the user to set or edit their date of birth within the personal profile section of the music app, with options to confirm or cancel the changes.
data_out: 更新后的生日月份设置

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the personal profile page and clicks the birthday setting button to enter the birthday editing interface. In this interface, the user can optionally adjust the year, month, or day using their respective selection wheels. After making changes (or not), the user can choose to either cancel the changes (by clicking the cancel button) or confirm the changes (by clicking the confirm button) to finalize the date of birth setting.

steps.summary: Click the birthday setting button to open the birthday editing interface.
Click the year selection wheel to adjust the year.
Click the month selection wheel to adjust the month.
Click the day selection wheel to adjust the day.
Click the cancel button to discard changes and exit the editing interface.
Click the confirm button to save changes and exit the editing interface.
